text: Cactus Garden at Kapiolani Community College (KCC). The Kapiolani Community College Cactus Garden is a small botanical garden specializing in cactus. It is located on the Kapiolani Community College campus, near Parking Lot C, at 4303 Diamond Head Road, Honolulu, Hawaii. The garden was created by Moriso Teraoka in 1988. ==See also== * List of botanical gardens in the United States ==References== ==External links== *The Hawai'i Memory Project: Cactus and Succulent Garden Category:Botanical gardens in Hawaii Category:Tourist attractions in Honolulu Category:Geography of Honolulu Category:Protected areas established in 1988 Category:1988 establishments in Hawaii Category:Cactus gardens
title: Kapiolani Community College Cactus Garden
